content: Some of our phone bankers are getting the message "phone number invalid" when they get to the follow-up text message part, after talking with a caller who wants to volunteer.  Happens repeatedly.  Anyone know?
Do you know if they confirmed the phone number? There might be someone with a better answer to this than me but itâ€™s possible the number is a landline
That would be my guess - a landline. Always confirm the number when you're sending a text.
